title: Evaluate Solutions to Reduce Water Withdrawal

content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following proposed solutions would have the greatest effect on reducing global water withdrawals?

choices.label: A coordinated public information campaign in rural areas about household water conservation.
Government grants to assist farmers with the up-front installation costs of drip irrigation systems.
Tax incentives for industries that reuse at least 10% of the water they withdraw for industrial processes.
An increase in the use of agricultural water to increase crop production in arid areas.

content.answer: Government grants to assist farmers with the up-front installation costs of drip irrigation systems.

skill.text: Skill 7.D: Use data and evidence to support a potential solution.
